autoop.core.database module

class autoop.core.database.Database(storage: Storage)[source]

Bases: object

A class representing a key-value database.

storage

The storage backend used to persist data.

Type:

Storage

delete(collection: str, id: str) → None[source]

Delete a key from the database.

Parameters:

  • collection (str) – The collection to delete the data from.

  • id (str) – The id of the data.

Returns:

None

get(collection: str, id: str) → dict | None[source]

Get a key from the database.

Parameters:

  • collection (str) – The collection to get the data from.

  • id (str) – The id of the data.

Returns:

The data that was stored, or None

if it doesn’t exist.

Return type:

Union[dict, None]

list(collection: str) → List[Tuple[str, dict]][source]

List all data in a collection.

Parameters:

collection (str) – The collection to list the data from.

Returns:

A list of tuples containing the id

and data for each item in the collection.

Return type:

List[Tuple[str, dict]]

refresh() → None[source]

Refresh the database by loading the data from storage.

Returns:

None

set(collection: str, id: str, entry: dict) → dict[source]

Set a key in the database.

Parameters:

  • collection (str) – The collection to store the data in.

  • id (str) – The id of the data.

  • entry (dict) – The data to store.

The data that was stored.
